Question: This person learned how to play the banjo with help from John McEuen, who later joined the Nitty Gritty Dirt Band.
Hints: In 2004, Comedy Central ranked this person at sixth place in a list of the 100 greatest stand-up comics.
On the show, this person popularized the air quotes gesture, which uses four fingers to make double quote marks in the air.
Skillfully forged paintings from this group were sold to French galleries like the one where this person bought the forgery.
